document_data.title: Weapons
document_data.author: [[Paul Culotta]]
document_data.realm year: [[Flamerule 21]]–[[Flamerule 22|22]] {{Yearlink|1360}}The players' first night in town is said to be Flamerule 21 (p. 37). Pontifel is slated for execution on Flamerule 22 (p. 38). Myrmeen adopted Krystin "about a year" ago, a reference to the events of ''[[The Night Parade]]'', which is set in {{Yearlink|1359}}. We can thus surmise this adventure is set in {{Yearlink|1360}}.
